## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2995e905819287e59d6b5783b99982f52a34248950fe69191354306f2873f85a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bettermode-common' @ 9999.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
